A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes galore\, dumb major character decisions\, poorly balanced humour and underwhelming new characters majorly take away from some of the best scenes in the franchise. As a lifelong Star Wars fan I was extremely dissapointed by this movie\, especially after the triumph that was Rogue One. I also feel as a continuation of The Force Awakens (which I liked) it follows on poorly\, and actually makes TFA worse. I came out of the theatre sad.
